A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson just destroyed Star Wars... and Disney is going to reward him with a trilogy. Kathleen Kennedy is not fit to run this saga. I'm appalled with this horrible movie. Congratulations on killing Star Wars for all the diehard fans. I've been a fan since I was 8 years old and saw the original in the cinema. I loved 'TFA' and rogue one\, and was so excited to see TLJ\, But now I'm beyond disheartened. I'm heartbroken. The franchise was just destroyed!
